# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -O nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.0.0-RC0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1048/org/openo/nfvo/sfc-driver-standalone/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver/1.0.0-RC0/nfvo-drivers-sdnc-zte-sfc-driver-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN unzip -o -B nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.0.0-RC0.zip
RUN rm -f nfvo-driver-sdnc-zte-1.0.0-RC0.zip
EXPOSE 8087
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC0 autorelease-1048 > VERSION
